website_summaries.verdict: Not worried about power and looking for something to clean your computer on a budget? This is the best bet for you.
pros: Cordless design with a rechargeable battery that recharges in 200 minutes via the included USB charger
Comes with 2 different nozzles and bonus cleaning gel for your keyboard
cons: Not as powerful as more expensive brands, but most buyers are happy with the amount of power this vacuum generated

customer_reviews.title: and the brush attachment is just perfect. It's small enough to get into tiny areas ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is surprisingly powerful. I needed something small to get into my sewing machines to clean out the lint and little scraps of thread and fabric, and the brush attachment is just perfect. It's small enough to get into tiny areas and picks up somewhat large pieces. I was surprised at how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: A RovettoTop Contributor: Fashion Design

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and power to clean caterpillar cages
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device to use exclusively for cleaning the cages of Monarch caterpillars, it is wonderful for this purpose. It saves me a lot of time and makes it possible to use the paper toweling as a cage floor cover at least twice as long. Caterpillar frass (poop) is pellet-like and dry so the vacuum is perfect for it. The small size, suction, and the cordless feature make it easy to get into the cages (15 x 15 x 15 and some larger). I am amazed that it holds a charge for so long, at least a week in my experience. If you are raising caterpillars to save the Monarch Butterflies, consider this.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: and the overall product quality seemed to be poor. Luckily
customer_reviews.text: I'm not gonna lie, I didn't have very high expectations when ordering this. The packaging was cheap, and the overall product quality seemed to be poor. Luckily, I was happily surprised. The product does exactly as it was advertised: it cleans keyboards. It 's portable, lightweight, and although it feels quite cheap, it does its job well. The suction isn't super strong, but it's strong enough to get those tiny dust particles and crumbs out from a keyboard. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly powerful little tool
customer_reviews.text: After having many of these types of vacuum cleaners fail on me, or not perform well, I was set to be disappointed once again. This one ended up having a decently strong suction, and I use it often. I like the fact that it is rechargeable, which does away with the issue of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: kiyo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived 1 day earlier than expected nothing missing works great for cleaning dust from my keyboard and around my ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived 1 day earlier than expected nothing missing works great for cleaning dust from my keyboard and around my desk more powerful then I thought it would be. would definitely recommend this for ppl looking for a small dust cleaner for cleaning small surfaces, It is not good for normal vacuums though so don't expect huge amounts of suction its made for small things like dust.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good Vacuum in a Small Size
customer_reviews.text: Quite powerful for such a small vacuum. Works great for keyboards and especially great for sewing machines. Has a reasonably good lint filter that is easy to clean. Comes with a brush head and a crevice tool. Charges quickly and holds a charge well during use. It charges faster with the included AC block. It has the same mini-plug as a Kindle so I usually charge it with one of our Kindle blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it is fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of this, but it works surprisingly well. I keep it on my desk to pick up the various crumbs my roommate and/or cat leaves, and for when I do my keyboard cleanings. The gel works well as an added bonus, and it is fun to play with. It has some attachments as a seperate purchase, I have no use for them, but someone might.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna A.

customer_reviews.title: Way bigger than pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this primarily to vacuum my sewing machine and my keyboard. The photo of the size of the vacuum looks like it's the size of about 9 keys (on keyboard) with crevice tool that appears small enough to go in between keys. Actual vacuum is way way bigger and the crevice tool was only slightly smaller than the key (and way bigger to go into the crevice). Couldn't even get it near the bobbin area of the sewing machine. I wish I could upload the photos I have of both. It seems to have decent suction but not enough to suck dust from distances.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: Sucks up dust and blows it out the side vents!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to collect pastel dust as I work. It sucked up the dust just fine then immediately blew it back out the side vents. Nothing hit the filter which is just a 1/4" foam pad. It may work for chunkier items but nothing like a fine dust. Plus, the air blows out of the side vents so much that it blows the dust around that hasn't been collected yet. Motor starts quietly and takes a few seconds to rev up each time. It becomes very loud for such a small item. There seems to be more power blowing out of the side vents then sucking in. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: camera fan

customer_reviews.title: An formidable little vacuum for industrial application
customer_reviews.text: When I looked for a portable vacuum that I want to use to clean the cables for the driller console on Amazon, this one fits my expectations in every way. As you can tell from my pictures, the small head of this vacuum fits perfectly into the male side of the cable and will suck all the small particles out of it. The battery performs well and exceeded my expectation. I'm sure it can be used elsewhere and will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche 935

customer_reviews.title: Cordless is making my life soooo easy!Very good
customer_reviews.text: ​As someone who is fixing PCs & laptops for living I really had to figure out something different that countless amounts of compressed air cans for cleaning fans & radiators inside of customers equipment. This came up on my recommended products to buy and decided to give it a go. So far I find it very useful for cleaning keyboards, fans, consoles, radiators or pretty much any electronics that can get dusty over time. This blower is not to heavy on batteries (not included), easy to use and efficient enough to do all listed above jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha G.

customer_reviews.title: Great little powerhouse, comes with extra filters!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily to clean my mech keyboard. It is EXTREMELY powerful, and although somewhat basic, it does what it's designed to do very well. There are two attachments: a small crevice tool and a circular brush-tipped tool. I use the brush-tipped tool mostly, because the end actually fits over the individual keycaps (the standard keys, larger ones not so much) and makes cleaning my keyboard a breeze. :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected considering price.
customer_reviews.text: The base filter, which comes attached by default is not meant to be used, it reduces suction. So after replacing the base filter with one of the additional two filters, I've got acceptable suction power considering it's battery-powered, and its small size. One thing that's little bit bugging me is it requires 3~5 seconds of 'warming up' time before reaching full power.
customer_reviews.author: ik1ne

customer_reviews.title: Works as  advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to clean out my keyboard, but now it cleans up the desktop, tight corners in drawers, screens over fans, etc. Note that if you use it in a quiet office, it will wake up anyone snoozing in adjacent cubicles. The suction comes with very noticeable fan noise. What I like best is that the cost was about the same as one or two cans of compressed air that did not do the job as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Deau Claire

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard vacuum works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great little keyboard vacuum. I work in a school kitchen and my keyboard is constantly dirty and this vacuum really picks up the dust. Has two different accessories to use to pick up and vacuum with a brush that gently glides over He keyboard. It plus Into the computer to charge and the power last for a while. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Verified Lego duster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean the Lego displays I keep on my desk. I didn't want to disassemble the kits, just to properly dust them. It works VERY well. I would still rather use compressed air for cleaning my keyboard though.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: Hardly any suction power at all.
customer_reviews.text: Even after fully charging, the suction on this is so weak it won't even pick up a napkin. Checking the filter after some use, I only found the very finest of dust particles in the filter. Also, it smells like the power supply is working so hard it seems like it's going to burn out after a week. I'm all for buying a cheap, appropriately priced product, but the basic rule is, it has to work as expected.
customer_reviews.author: impulse94

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! - for picking up guinea pig poop
customer_reviews.text: On its 1st day, I'm delighted with it - it's perfect for picking up the guinea pig poop without either 1 - sucking up the cloth the poop is sitting on or 2 - violently blowing everything around in the cage with its exhaust air The Black + Decker DustBuster has both these problems for this small job. It looks delightful, too, for doing what the "ETG Vacuum Pro Dusty Brush Tubes Attachment" attachment is supposed to do. I'm impressed with all I got for the small price - the 2 attachments etc. I hope to leave it plugged in, charging - but neither the email address nor the website work, for answering my question!
customer_reviews.author: HGH

customer_reviews.title: This sucks - or, more precisely, it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: This has decent enough power for cleaning around the top of my desk and certain parts of my mechanical keyboard, but when it comes to doing what I really need it to do, it's pretty useless. Neither the slanted nozzle or the brush will fit between the keys, which is where the crud accumulates. It's back to compressed air for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction and it shuts off
customer_reviews.text: The suction power of this thing is non-existent. I was excited about this mini vacuum but it can't really do what it was intended to do. The air coming out from the exhaust is stronger. I would have been okay with the low power because I didn't need anything strong but it randomly shuts off! Even when it is "ramping up" it'll just turn off. Right out of the box it did this and after I charged it as well. Definitely not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoni Customeri

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: First, I received this unit and the filter in the unit was caked with white hairs and had to be thrown out. However, after putting in a new filter I am beginning to wonder how the first filter was even caked since this unit doesn't seem to have much suction at all. It takes a few seconds to "spin up" and whine at max volume but when you put it to the keyboard, it barely picks up anything. I tried light pressure and hard pressure, but either way it barely picks up anything. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: D. DAmico

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this to clean the inside of my PC as well as the keyboard but it unfortunately sucks, and not in the good way. I had to return it for something that actually works. On the plus side it came with some green slime that worked better to pick up the dust than the actual product lol
customer_reviews.author: Boyd Soule

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed. This power of this thing is so ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disapointed. This power of this thing is so week it barly picks up dust. The ad is a lie I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kemper

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It works just ok. The suction power is not very strong. I have a co-worker who has psoriasis and I bought this to clean their desk area without them knowing (I don't want to embarrass them). But it takes forever to suck up the skin flakes. I have to make several passes over the same area and it still doesn't pick up everything.
customer_reviews.author: ChillMill

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy - no suction whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the weakest suction I’ve ever encountered in anything called a vacuum. Definitely do NOT waste your money on the product - all it does it make a loud noise. No vacuuming. No cleaning. It is absolute trash.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Skip it! Weak!
customer_reviews.text: I watched the video. It seemed wonderful for PC/keyboard use. This vac has such weak power. Then when you empty it, the dust and dirt goes everywhere defeating the purpose. Thank goodness Amazon stands behind its customers. Returned!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany CherryBlossom

customer_reviews.title: I love this small vacuum! You need this little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I got this small vacuum to take the lint out of my sewing machine. It works great! It can be used on computer keyboards or other machines or things that need to be cleaned where a regular vacuum would not work. I also found a small blower the same size. Using both on my sewing machine keeps the lint and dust out so that the machine works more efficiently. Both eliminate my need to use tweezers to try to take the lint out of the sewing machine. You need this little vacuum! I am a very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: EdDiag

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning up fake dollhouse snow.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this strictly for the small annoying beads of foam snow with my daughter’s LOL House. I wanted something small and convenient to pick up these staticky beads so they could be reused. You can see from the pics and video this vacuum works perfectly for this. I charged it before the first use with the provided usb cord. It slowly starts then picks up speed after a few seconds. How much you like the vacuum will depend on what you are using it for. This is especially helpful around the delicate areas of the dollhouse where the beads cling and get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: This thing Sucks! In a good way, lol.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on an impulse during a lightning sale. My keyboard was getting dirty and so i took the plunge and picked this thing up. It comes with two nozzle and has surprisingly good suction for the size of the thing. Also comes with a keyboard cleaning gel that i havent tried out yet, but its a cool freebie. My major complaints is that this is for sure a little on the nosier side. The biggest pet peeve is that the cleaner seems to come undone easily. The latch that holds things together comes lose easily spilling the contents, making a mess. Sure its easy to clean it back up but i wish i didnt have to.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydeltoro

customer_reviews.title: Zero suction, just a brush that makes noise
customer_reviews.text: Like the headline says, there is zero suction. Which is the entire point of a vacuum. The free gel it came with was nice but obviously not at this price. As far as "easy to use" or "easy to clean", these two categories become irrelevant when the product can't even perform its basic function. I trashed it, not even worth the hassle of attempting to get a refund. Use the vacuum you use around your house, it may be bulky but at least it works. And stop eating crackers at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Styles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who eat at their desk
customer_reviews.text: I often work through lunch, and over time my low profile laptop had little bits in the keyboard. I didn't want to force those bits inside by using compressed air and possibly have the keys stick. This was perfect to remove the chip crumbles, eraser shavings, and broken pieces of white-out! The suction is ok, and not as strong as i would like but it does the job. Its a bit loud and not very discrete (coworkers laugh at me when i use it), but overall it worth the cost and a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: vpoe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small and easy to use, but.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is easy to use, I find it weird how you have to hold down the button to start it and press once to shut instead of normally clicking it to start and clicking it to stop. The suction wasn't bad but wasn't that good either, expected more, but it gets the job done. However, the only thing that I didn't like is how loud it was. I thought it'll be a low hum or a medium hum but it sounds like a car drifted past me or a plane flew past me. It bothers me so much I use it as little as possible
customer_reviews.author: Benson.S

customer_reviews.title: Fills a niche
customer_reviews.text: I have a full on vacuum and a dust buster type device like most people but this is a go between kind of gadget. When it arrived I immediately used it to vacuum up the dust around my window sills and it did a great job at that. I have several gaming keyboards that I like to keep immaculate so i'm sure this will also do well at that. It had no problem sucking up what I wanted it to. I would recommend for anyone who wants to dust\clean a specific small area
customer_reviews.author: techyoda

customer_reviews.title: Jealousy
customer_reviews.text: I am jealous of the many reviews that love this product. I am only one person, so please don't base your buying this on me. But for me it is junk. It was virtually impossible to put the little plug into the vacuum. I charged it for many hours. Nothing. I am too tired to send it back. It was just tossed into the garbage. Final note, maybe this was a fluke, and a defective model. But either way, I cannot recommend this at all. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I order two. One worked and the other will not turn on. It just make crazy sound. After contacting the seller who wants me to send it back at my expense. The seller also asked for pictures which I did. Beware this item is defective and the seller do not care.
customer_reviews.author: CharBB

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum does the small jobs. I had ordered hoping to use in my car for the side compartments of my truck. The Extention nozzles are too small. I used on carpet stairs, an door jambs. Works fairly well for those areas. The container does fall off sometimes and be careful with the filters. Make sure product is turned off, the filter sucked into the machine and stopped working. I was able to get it out with a prior of scissors. Its par for the course with these types of vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: tibbs

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum is borderline useless.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to upload a video of how pathetic the suction is but I do not want invest the time into doing that for this disappointing product. I was not expecting much since it was only 20 bucks but this thing should be sold for 5 bucks as gag gift. If you use the precise attachment and hold it onto your skin it won't even leave a suction mark. It failed to suck up cat hair or the dust in my keyboard. It can't even lift a light plastic sandwich bag or one square of tissue paper. Save your 20 bucks and buy air duster and lint rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless item !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rip off !!!........ came without any means to recharge........inadequate suction..........box contained only : 1) the main unit 2) two extra filters 3) instructions 4) pkg of Gel no nozzles were included nor was there any means to recharge the item, nor any instructions pertaining to recharging. I guess you just throw it away when the battery runs down !! Without nozzles cannot clean keyboard! Totally useless !!!
customer_reviews.author: ced

customer_reviews.title: it’s suction is average
customer_reviews.text: For this vacuum it was pretty unique. You use a usb to charge it but when it is full, the red lights turn off. There is only one button so only one suction option. The box included 2 extra dust collected foams a white lid for the power button usb cord 2 of the heads (one with a brush and another one for like small places) a fun gel cleaning substance? When using the vacuum it’s pretty loud. It’s suction power is average for picking up lint or dust although laptop keyboards is harder to clean. It is unable to pick up dust/lint from the iPhone speakers but it’s a fun tool to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Barely any suction
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to vacuum my keyboard without having to remove the keykaps, and it hardly works with the keys removed. It only sucks things the nozzle is directly over, regardless of the nozzle used. There is lint on the filter after use but it's lack of sucction means it does not complete even the simplist of jobs. Do not recommend for its intended purpose. A paper towel would do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Alligator Jones

customer_reviews.title: It is great.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy really is powerful. I have had these babies since the first one over 30 years ago and this is the best. The battery gets a little hot when charging. It starts slow and builds power but it has solved my annoying, the space bar doesn't work half the time,problem and they included some of that goo cleaning stuff. Wheee... that is slime for adults. I have cleaned clean things with it. It's just so much fun,
customer_reviews.author: Janice Scott-Reeder, Druid

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea.  Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: It seemed exactly what I was looking for in keeping my keyboard and electronics clean. It is very simple and easy to use. The quality was however, "construction grade". It lasted a few times. After that the little motor that couldn't began to oscillate between normal and very low rpm. It finally gave up the ghost after only about five or six uses. The thing was just too under-powered and too poorly built to make it any longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Straight_Talk

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This little USB vacuum is great. My package did NOT include the gel pad. This is why I gave it four stars instead of five. Once charged this vacuum has lots of suction. I was able to remove accumulated, embedded dust and lint from between the keys of two heavily used keyboards. I did not make any effort to get the missing gel pad, I opted ordered a five pack of gel pads.
customer_reviews.author: Dykhuis

customer_reviews.title: Product 1 star/seller 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: My honest review of the product was 1 star as "TWO" units did not work (probably a bad batch). However, the seller is very quick with the free postage paid return and postage free replacement and the full unit cost refund. Excellent customer service...just wish "vaccuum" worked as I like the design and features. The free jell is really "goopy" and fun to work with.
customer_reviews.author: LeeZarr

customer_reviews.title: Pssh
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that I use it to clean out PlayStation 3's so I wouldn't need to use the compressed air cans and this is completely trash! It can barley suck up the dust the is suck in the vents as stated but other's the slime is the only thing that works and I'll be throwing the garbage away! It's not worth 3.99 on a good day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say beside that it keep my keyboard free of cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I like to think of myself as a clean and tidy person. But as someone who likes to eat at my computer as well as owning a cat. The occasionaly debrises do find their way into my mechanical keyboards. The vacuum was a nice way to clean up without having to take out every single key. The included putty is always nice for the occasional dusting. This thing actually has localized suction so it doesnt blow things everywhere during use. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Hung Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Used it once, doesn't run anymore
customer_reviews.text: Used it once to test it and it no longer works now. Plugged it in to charge it and now it starts for 3 seconds and instantly stops. Repeatedly. Just will not start and run. Feel like this is money tossed into the trash. Hard to give a good review since I barely got to see it in action. Very dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Lawlor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I dunno what prior reviewers were expecting but this little thing is the bomb diggity! It isn't a Hoover yall but for the size it's quite impressive! I am going to need another soon, I use this one in the kitchen to suck the crumbs up that get stuck in corners, and to clean up my sewing area, which seems to create little bits of thread and fabric at the rate of 1 bazillion a mmin.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works pretty well. It has a decent amount of suction power for how small it is. It's perfect for cleaning dust out of keyboards or other small areas. It doesn't pick up much heavy stuff, but it is fine for general dust and dirt. The filter is easy to remove and wash. Charge lasts long enough to do several small cleaning jobs. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: wiretap

customer_reviews.title: Sucks but in a poor way
customer_reviews.text: Good size for what I wanted and it functions. I got it for cleaning up my desk after drawing and for keyboards. The suction is weak and does pick up eraser bits in a few passes. The filter that comes installed is too thick for the suction and the included extras are thinner and work better. There are better products out there I am sure but I bought this one and will make it work.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Just blows the dirt out the sides
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucked up the dirt and dust just fine.... But then it blew it out the sides all over everything. I tried using both filters at once, and it didn't help. This thing needs a better dust bag or dust catcher. Returning it
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: MECO MINI VAC: A FABULOUS TOOL!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the MECO desk vacuum to clean a collection of very fragile antique dolls. It held its charge for more than an hour and its suction was enough to clean away all of the dust without doing any damage. I have small hands, so I had a little trouble opening the vacuum to clean the filter, but this is my problem, not MECO's. This teeny vacuum cleaner is a genius tool!
customer_reviews.author: DrP Q

customer_reviews.title: Could have been good if it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May, used it once to clean my keyboard then packed it away. Now in November I pulled it out, left it on charge overnight and tried it the next day... it just doesn't work like it did. The little motor spools up, spools down and just loops doing that. It doesn't really suck up anything anymore. So I recommend this product if you're satisfied with a single use for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Darren S.

customer_reviews.title: Definitive Review
customer_reviews.text: Alright dear reader, here's the review you've been looking for. I tried this thing so you don't have to. As you might have guessed, the one star reviews likely had unreasonable expectations. This is an inexpensive vacuum. If you want to suck up dust and crumbs without spending $100, this gets the job done. The included bag-o-slime is the real mvp here. Unless your keyboard looks like my work one (pictured before and after vacuuming), you could probably just order the slime and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Won't replace canned air
customer_reviews.text: You can certainly use this to clean the lint and dust out of your vent fans, or get junk out of your keyboard, if you do it regularly enough that there's not much there to clean. But this isn't going to replace canned air. Use some canned air for the tough jobs, and to get your things clean, then use this regularly to avoid having to use the canned air most of the time after that.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Perricone

customer_reviews.title: Just like my ex-girlfriend, it doesn't suck hard enough.
customer_reviews.text: When you turn this thing on, it takes a good 30 seconds for the motor to spin up. Even then, the suction is so weak I have to basically put the tip right on the debris to pick anything up. This problem is even worse with the brush attachment. It's VERY loud, and the exhaust points right out the side, causing it to blow debris around just as much as it picks it up.
customer_reviews.author: SlickStretch

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, easy to use, I should have tried this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know I was missing this in my life, now I can't live with out it. It packs a powerful suction for such a small vacuum. It gets everything, from food crumbs on my desk, dirt/hair in my keyboard and I even use it to vacuum things on the floor. It gets everything. It's so much easier to use this than a bulky regular vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: KoKo

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this primarily for use for cleaning a sewing machine. It works great. At first I thought it was defective because it didn't turn on immediately when the power switch was depressed. You have to hold the power switch on for several seconds before the motor starts. I don't know if this is part of the design or a flaw in this particular unit, but now that I know about that delay, it works perfectly. Easy to clean and has plenty of suction for removing lint from my sewing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Pop

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was stronger suction
customer_reviews.text: Got this to clean keyboards and debris off our PC desk at home. I was torn between the corded and cordless versions, but ended up with the cordless. It's a handy tool to have in our PC room, but I do wish it had a stronger suction. It starts off slow then ramps up, it sounds like a helicopter starting up. A tad overpriced, but again useful to have for daily quick cleans up on our desks.
customer_reviews.author: ShopaholicTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum packs a punch! So easy to use, lasts just long enough on a full charge, and gets in small spaces. It got all the crumbs out of my car cup holders so quickly. The charge cord is a good length, and it charges quickly. Plan to use it at work on my keyboard, and I have no doubt it will clean it without any issues. Good purchase, good price, good product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tina D

customer_reviews.title: Works great everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum. It works everywhere. In hard to reach places on my knickknack shelves, in my windowsills, and in every other little crevice that I needed to clean out. The battery lasts long enough to get a good job done and it charges quickly. It’s easy to clean. So far I have used and recharged it three times with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Suction
customer_reviews.text: When it starts, it revs up to its top speed after @ 10 seconds. But even at top speed it doesn’t pick up much. Cannot use the attachments, nothing is picked up. Very disappointed. I know it’s not expensive, but why can’t you get a small, convenient vacuum that actually works? I’d rather this was a wired electric vacuum if that would increase suction.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought to clean out the inside of my sewing machine. It has decent suction, but I wish it came with a tinyier attachment because the ones included are too big to fit in the workings of my machine. Some kind of flexible tube would be awesome. I might be able to find something at Lowe’s that will fit the body as a DIY attachment.
customer_reviews.author: KYkari

customer_reviews.title: picks up pastel dust but charge doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my purpose..picking up small amts of pastel dust. must keep it plugged in however because it does not hold charge for very long. small enough to fit into my art portfolio carry case, but must benear an outlet, so not good for field work. lack of charge holding power is why I only gave 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: chakeetah

customer_reviews.title: Clean that Nasty Key Board
customer_reviews.text: We forget how much "stuff" falls into our keys on our laptops and computers. Between DEAD skin, dust, pet hair and Dandre, potato chips, and other crumbs.. it clogs up our key stork mechanism . A few of my keys were sticking. Glad I got this. Plug in to USB and Allow to charge. Cant wait to see the look on your face once you clean your keyboard, then twist off the filter cap and see the grey dirt/dust filer. YUKKKK . Got to have one of these !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUCTION IS TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I never knew the word "suction" meant NO SUCTION OF ANYTHING WHATSOEVER. This little vacuum seemed great for my desk. Small. Compact. Easy to use. Little did I know.....the suction is TERRIBLE. It was so bad I thought that it had to be fully drained of battery. Charged it over night. Same as before...TERRIBLE.
customer_reviews.author: Hostos FQ

customer_reviews.title: Not as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea that it is portable. What I don’t like about it, it is not as I imagined or as it seems in the pictures. It’s a small vacuum that just vacuum small particles of dust. I should not have put high hopes on it. My advice, don’t look at how it looks in the ad because it’s just a picture really. I still use the product for vaccumimg the dust particles out of my MacBook, just for that, nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Weak and Useless
customer_reviews.text: Did I get a defective one? After charging all night this barely picks up a hair.
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Life saving device for people who do beadwork!
customer_reviews.text: I use this vacuum to pick up small beads that I drop. My 6-year-old likes to use it to help me pick up beads, too. I have used it in my car and on my keyboard. My far one of the smartest purchases I have made. I was a little nervous when I first turned it on because it didn't seem to have a lot of suction, but it just kept on getting louder and the suction got better, so it served its purpose well! It just needed a minute to get up to speed, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Abysmal -- Basically Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I have a mechanical keyboard which I adore, but it attracts dust with some regularity and I was hoping this would be a solution to keeping it clean, but this device has no suction ability at all. It came packaged with a cleaning gel, which IS useful, but the vacuum itself was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: FilmGeek

customer_reviews.title: Ehh hard pass on this one.
customer_reviews.text: It's not that great. Save your money and use canned air. The suction is not that great and really doesn't perform how you want it to perform for cleaning a keyboard. Even with the attachment that helps to focus suction it is very lacking in suction power. It is incredibly cheaply made and I am sure that this should be priced closer to the 5$ range.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kingsland

customer_reviews.title: Really Good!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the product, wish there was a little more suction power but I get the most suction power after I fully charge it. The base filter, the filter that was already inside the vacuum when you first get the package, is the best filter, the other 2 filters that came with the package are alright but the 1st filter is better because it's more dense and less dust goes through it into the vacuum. It's worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Juan Diego Ureno

customer_reviews.title: Cute little vacuum if you only suck up dust.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute little vacuum, probably great for cleaning keyboards, but I was hoping it would help pick up stray plastic bits around my 3D printer, but it was not really designed for long plastic threads, so I'm not really happy with it. For keyboards or dirty desk drawers it is probably pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for use to clean computer keyboards, and was very pleasantly surprised to find it works really, really well. When I first used it, it didn't seem to be doing anything, but when I cleaned the filter I was amazed at what this little guy sucked out. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Ter

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price point
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my first use of the Meco Vaccuum. This proved ideal for my intended use: cleaning computer keyboards. It took me about 10 minutes for a thorough cleaning of two keyboards and 1 screen. The gel worked remarkably well, but if you opt for safe green products, I will point out that it's made completely from parabens.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Te vacuum is good!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum surprisingly picks up more than what I would expect... The soft sweeping nozzle is very useful. However, the gel is not as effective, mainly because I cannot use it to do deep clean after I take the keycaps for all my keys. The gel is not cohesive enough to stick together to itself more than my laptop, so it's easy to leave remnants of the gell on your inner keyboards, without the caps on. Regardless though, I still like the gel very much. It is not suggested, be cautious, to be used with mechanical keyboards with caps taken off!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning keyboard and inside pc.
customer_reviews.text: Great handheld vacuum for cleaning up dust inside my pc (the case is pretty big) and my keyboard. They give you extra filters to replace when they get filled. The filters are reusable so all you have to do it flush the dust off with water and let it dry until you need it again. When you run low on batteries you can recharge it with any micro usb, as long as its plugged into power.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT mini vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!!!! Convenient, powerful, small, stores easily, powerful - Exceeds expectations, that's for sure. I've been looking for something like this for a long time and FINALLY! Great for computer, drawer corners, corners in general, tiny spaces that are hard to clean or get to. SUPERB!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O

customer_reviews.title: Uses beyond keyboard crud: Monarch frass
customer_reviews.text: I am a Monarch butterfly rancher. During Coronavirus times, paper towels are too scarce to line habitats to collect Caterpillars' frass (doo doo). This keyboard vacuum is suffcient suction, quiet, and a delicate touch amongst the Cats and chrysalises. Two washable filters were included. One twist and the tank is easily emptied over the garden wall. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VivaP

customer_reviews.title: The suction does not work, at all.
customer_reviews.text: The suction does not work, at all. Literally picks up nothing. This little machine really just a noisemaker. I'm going to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you have a pet!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of blowing out all the cat hair from my laptop and Magic Keyboard. Got this thing and it's fantastic! It's great for the small dirt, dust, and pet hair on keyboards and can suction it. If anything is slightly lodged, it has a brush head that can remove that as well.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Defective Unit or Bought Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be able to suck tea leaves and coffee beans. It doesn't. Period. I fully charged the product, aimed it at a pile of tea leaves on the table, and nothing happened. Tea leaves didn't even move. AND this thing is extremely loud, even louder than my carpet vacuum which is 20 times the size. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Ruizhe Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Raising Monarch Butterflies!
customer_reviews.text: If you're raising Monarch Butterflies, this is the perfect tool. Monarch Caterpillars poop A LOT, and cleaning their poop is time consuming. This vacuum easily picks up the poop, and you can easily discard it by just opening the vacuum and dumping the poop. 10/5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Alanis

customer_reviews.title: Air doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I'd forgotten I bought this a YEAR ago. My husband was talking about getting one...so I found mine, which I'd never used. We turned it on and NO AIR comes out of the funnel. Air comes out of the air vents by where you HOLD the product. Doesn't do a thing. Terrible!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum good. Goo not so good.
customer_reviews.text: The little vacuum has a surprising amount of suction power for how small it is. Be careful with the goo. I left mine on my keyboard a little to long and it actually left a good amount of goo under the keys. I resorted to just taking apart my keyboard to clean it with help from the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel walker

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my sewing machine of excess fluff. It did well, except that it was a little large to get in the tight places, but it saved time, not so much brushing fluff. Cleanup was great, filter easy to get to. I cleared the lint that was easily removed and then rinsed the remainder down the drain. Let the filter air dry. and store for the next time. The extra filter was inserted so it was ready for use.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Suggest compressed air instead, if it's for cleaning a keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Has very little suction power, even after charging overnight. I ended up having to just use compressed air to blow the stuff away from under the keys, which is probably what I should have bought in the first place. And the gel just seems silly.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great small vacuum that gets the job done for incredible price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum for keyboards or hard to get to spots. Great battery life that seems to go forever. Handy quick clean out, and usb charger. Small enough to get into those tough spots and strong suction to get job done. This gadget makes me laugh because it is so useful for such a fair price. Great value buy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: CYNTHIA DERRINGER

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but not too useful for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in my car for cleaning up cigarette ashes. The problem is that ashes are so fine that they pass through the filter and are blown right out the back of the vacuum, resulting in a big mess. I tried to fix the problem using a piece dryer sheet cut to fit over the filter, but it didn't really help.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction.
customer_reviews.text: I planned on keeping this in my car to get the dust out of the all the nooks and crannies because I like to keep my car as clean as possible...the suction power simply isn’t enough to grab pull any particles that are even a cm or so out of reach.
customer_reviews.author: K Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very, very weak vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: This thing basically has no suction power whatsoever. You might as well take the brush nozzle and use it to dust things off, it'll be quicker and more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use around my stove. I have a glass top and crumbs get caught in the caulking at the etches. It picks up most of the crumbs. Since only use this a minute at a time, the charge holds well
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: No suction and does not turn off
customer_reviews.text: I opened this product hoping to clean up crumbs and dust from my laptop and keyboard without using compressed air. After charging, I turned the vacuum on and it was super loud and did not have the level of suction I wanted. The worst part was when I powered off the vacuum, the fan continued to spin, so I have to wait until the battery runs out and hope that the fan will stop (shown in video).
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ho

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: There's hardly any suction. If the dust isn't already lifted then it likely wouldn't be picked up. Even the light weight dust if it is stuck in a hole. I attempted to use this on my ps4 pro and its fan stand, the electronics brush I had bought did a better job. But the sides of ps4 you have to use a Q tip on, forget it...It is not fitting in there and it doesn't have the suction power to lift it out.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations for my very odd job
customer_reviews.text: I make miniature street art for a living. Odd job, I know. But I've been looking for a powerful battery-powered tiny vacuum for a long time and this is it! I just bought another for the studio, since the one i use on the street is sure to get so much use. In my opinion, for a $20 vacuum, this is pretty excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Before I thing this is only a small vacuum .now when I used it , this is amazing tool,I can use it to clean keyboards,also I use it to clean some edge on the floor that too small to reach and some hairs on bed .It comes with brush,small filter which is easy to clean ,and a usb charger.it is powerful and convenient !
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great for keyword, OK for LEGO
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one with the intention to clean up my LEGO sets and it does a good job, even though you still need a toothbrush to reach some of the most difficult/small places. It’s not as noisy as other models and certainly works well when it comes to regular keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works well
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use, recharge and clean. The suction power is acceptable, but it is not easy to get all the crumbs from the deep grooves of a standard keyboard. It sounds like running very hard and the battery drains rather quickly. All in all it severed me well - my keyboards have never been this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jen yuan

customer_reviews.title: Very interesting solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a very interesting cleaning solution to keyboards and other gadgets I have used this for all of my game systems ranging from Dreamcast ps2-3 Xbox list goes on and it’s very safe to vacuum dust and mess that may be around quick charge as well via usb
customer_reviews.author: TamarBenz007

customer_reviews.title: Works great for fine coffee grounds
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it to vacuum up fine coffee grinds that escape my grinder. It works great! It takes a few seconds to spin up to speed, but it has great suction then. It is super easy to empty and clean/replace the filter. It is much better than I expected for the price. I'm now buying another one to give to a fellow coffee aficionado for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Keyboard Cleaner with Cleaning Gel, MECO Rechargeable Mini Vacuum Cordless Vacuum Desk Vacuum Cleaner, Best Cleaner for Cleaning Dust,Hairs,Crumbs,Scraps for Laptop,Piano,Computer,Car and Pet House
feature_bullets: Powerful Suction: Rechargeable vacuum cleaner with 2000mAh Li-battery provides powerful suction, cleaning dust, hairs, crumbs, scraps for laptop, mechanical keyboard, piano, makeup bag, car, pet house;
Cordless and Rechargeable: Cordless keyboard cleaner with rechargeable Li-battery, be free to use it everywhere after 200 minutes charging;
2 Vacuum Nozzles: 2 Different vacuum nozzles allow you to reach the tightest spaces; Flat nozzle can inhale little pieces of paper while brush nozzle can dry ash and dust ;
Filter Media: Providing effective filter system, you can just open the dust collector and take the filter net out. And the filter media can be washed clean with fresh water, then be reused ;

Portable Handheld Size: The keyboard vacuum is in a small size (8.46 x 5.31 in), enables you to take it anywhere you want to clean up. ★Any questions, welcome to send us email via support@meco-ele.com. We will reply within 24 hours.
